To launch your site with GitHub Pages:
1. Go to https://github.com/sanjay-bobby-dev/MY-PORTFOLIO
2. Click 'Settings' > 'Pages' in the sidebar.
3. Under 'Build and deployment', select 'Deploy from a branch'.
4. Set 'Branch' to 'main' and '/ (root)'.
5. Save. Your site will be live at https://sanjay-bobby-dev.github.io/MY-PORTFOLIO/

You can delete this file after setup.
